inclusion.criterion: Type 2 diabetes for ≥ 3 months treated with metformin (≥ 1000 mg/day) alone or
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Males or females between the ages of 18 and 80 years admitted to a general medicine services not requiring intensive care and not expected to require surgery.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis 7 years ago
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Acute critical illness expected to require admission to a critical care unit
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients expected to require major surgery (requiring general anesthesia)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients treated with less than 1000 mg/day of metformin prior to admission
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes, but meets the inclusion criteria for age and blood glucose levels. He does not meet the exclusion criteria for uncompensated heart failure.
